events.title: The Beautiful Life Tour with Pat Barrett
events.location: Marietta, Georgia, United States Of America
events.description: We will be following the local COVID guidelines at the time of the event. Attendees over the age of 2 will be required to have their own ticket. If attendee arrives after specified ticket type door time, participation in ticket type benefits can not be guaranteed. Ticket prices are subject to change based on demand and/or when purchased at the door. All purchases are non-refundable. Door Schedule (subject to change): VIP - 5:00 PM VIP Q&A - 5:30 PM Reserved - 6:00 PM Show Start - 7:00 PM
